math
Class GraphPlot2D

java.lang.Object
  math.GraphPlot2D

public class GraphPlot2D
extends java.lang.Object

Class for plotting two dimensional graphs.

Author:
Murat Artim

tolerance_

private static final double tolerance_
The writing tolerance. Absolute values smaller than this value will be considered as zero.
